scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Samantha Pedroza
scrape.text: What detestable characters! Not a single one had any moral! Well one did sort of but even he was a prick! I felt like this could have been shorter some of the off topic descriptions or thought patterns really didn't fit and the lack or resolution really grinds my gears but overall I didn't hate the story I hated the people in it.
